infos.value: One-handed Sword; can be equipped to Lords, Warriors, Knights, Paladins, Spellblades, Red Mages, the Winged One, Squires, Sword Saints, and Fell Knights
Greatsword; can be equipped to Soldiers
Katana; can be equipped to Samurai
Knuckles; can be equipped to Monks
Spear; can be equipped to Dragoons and Lancers
Dagger; can be equipped to Thieves
Ninja Blade; can be equipped to Ninjas
Bow; can be equipped to Rangers and White Mages of Lapis
Gun; can be equipped to Gunners and Dual Gunners
Staff; can be equipped to White Mages, Black Mages, Green Mages, Time Mages, and Sorceresses
Mace; can be equipped to Clerics
Armor; can be equipped to Lords, Warriors, Knights, Paladins, Soldiers, Samurai, Lancers, Dragoons, Spellblades, the Winged One, Squires, and Fell Knights

Hat; can be equipped to Lords, Warriors, Monks, Lancers, Thieves, Rangers, Ninjas, Gunners, White Mages, Black Mages, Clerics, Red Mages, Time Mages, Green Mages, White Mages of Lapis, Dual Gunners, Sorceresses, Gunbreakers, Squires, and Sword Saints

Clothing; can be equipped to Lords, Warriors, Monks, Lancers, Thieves, Rangers, Ninjas, Gunners, White Mages, Black Mages, Clerics, Red Mages, Time Mages, Green Mages, White Mages of Lapis, Vikings, Dual Gunners, Sorceresses, Gunbreakers, Squires, and Sword Saints
Helm; can be equipped to Lords, Warriors, Samurai, Lancers, Dragoons, Knights, Paladins, Soldiers, Spellblades, the Winged One, Vikings, Squires, and Fell Knights
Accessory; can be equipped to all Job types
Axe; can be equipped to Vikings

A special pack containing a [Six-Month Anniversary] Select Job Memory (Red) x5 Summon Ticket, a [Six-Month Anniversary] Select Job Memory (Yellow) x4 Summon Ticket, a Select Element Alcryst (Red) x70 Summon Ticket, and a Select Element Alcryst (Yellow) x70 Summon Ticket! *The [Six-Month Anniversary] Select Job Memory (Red) x5 Summon Ticket and the [Six-Month Anniversary] Select Job Memory (Yellow) x4 Summon Ticket cannot be used for Job Memories of collaborative units.
A special pack containing Rune Blade +3 (Aim) and Secret Books of Refinement (Greatsword)!
A special pack containing Coral Sword +3 (Assault) and Secret Books of Refinement (Sword)!

A special pack filled with UR Lasswell Unit Shards necessary for Limit Breaking, Ice Fragments of Thought necessary for Awakening, and bonus items such as Rainbow Vision Spheres and a Rainbow Fragment of Thought!
A special pack stuffed with EXP Cubes (L/XL)! Essential for enhancing units!
A special pack stuffed with Growth Eggs (SR/MR)! Essential for enhancing vision cards!
A special pack containing Ice Lance +3 (Critical) and Secret Books of Refinement (Spear)!

A special pack containing Adamantite (XL) together with bonus Secret Books of Refinement (Spear) needed to awaken spears, Attack Seals and Damage Seals respectively used to improve the chance of an equipment item's ATK stat and CRIT stat increasing when it's leveled up, as well as an ATK Dwarven Hammer and a Finisher Dwarven Hammer respectively used to increase the ATK stat and CRIT stat of your equipment!

A special pack containing Adamantite (XL) together with bonus Secret Books of Refinement (Bow) needed to awaken bows, Attack Seals and Skill Seals respectively used to improve the chance of an equipment item's ATK stat and ACC stat increasing when it's leveled up, as well as an ATK Dwarven Hammer and an Accuracy Dwarven Hammer respectively used to increase the ATK stat and ACC stat of your equipment!
